name: SPECIAL DELIVERY BOT
description:
~~~~~~~~ SPECIAL DELIVERY BOT PROGRAMME ~~~~~~~~

while(gameObject.activeSelf)

{

yield return WaitFor(CollectPackages());

DeliverPackages();

}

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Play as Special Delivery Bot as you deliver packages to your customers! Make sure to collect the packages in the right order or you'll recieve complaints (collect three of those and you'll be fired!) Keep track of the number of packages you are holding too as you can only carry at most 5 packages or the weight will cause you to break down. How much can you earn before you inevitably break down?

Let's find out! (Also I challenge you to beat my highscore of 330!)

MUSIC BY:

We Are One by Vexento https://www.youtube.com/user/Vexento
https://soundcloud.com/vexento
Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/Ssvu2yncgWU
